name: The Cult: Forgotten Ritual (Demo)
description:
Synopsis

One day, William, a young PhD student in mathematics, while returning from a late night party, got knocked out by strangers.

When he wakes up, he found himself trapped in a mysterious underground temple, with no way out and a lot of strange rooms...

Description

It's a demo of the game "The Cult", it's in a 2D point and click style.

The artistic direction was inspired by H. P. Lovecraft and H. R. GIGER.

Developpement Team Producer

Bryan BONI
